revision.text: Possibly: The gentle shepherd: a Scots pastoral comedy : adorned with cuts, the overtures to the songs, and a complete glossary / by Allan Ramsay. (Edinburgh : Printed for Charles Elliot, Parliament-Square, M.DCC.LXXVI. [1776]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1875807~S1
